## BaseModelController.removeRoute() method

Deletes a route

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeRoute(path: ("/" | "/:id"), methods: ('get' | 'patch' | 'put' | 'delete' | 'post')[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | ("/" \| "/:id") | The path ('/' \| '/:id') |
|  methods | ('get' \| 'patch' \| 'put' \| 'delete' \| 'post')\[\] | The methods which should be deleted ('get' \| 'patch' \| 'put' \| 'delete' \| 'post') |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
